document_data.name: Rose Scythe of Chauntea
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rose Scythes of Chauntea''''' were weapons used by worshipers of the [[Chauntea|Earthmother]]. They were enchanted with beneficial magic, empowering their user's spells and protecting their allies against attacks.{{Cite dragon/412/Channel Divinity: Chauntea and Silvanus}}
document_data.Description: ''Rose Scythes'' were sturdy tools carved with the images of wheat sheaves, and whose blades were engraved with the image of a single [[rose]]. They could be used as walking sticks and farming tools and could also provide help to divine spellcasters.
document_data.Powers: ''Rose Scythes'' empowered the magic of divine spellcasters, and protected healed allies against attacks from their foes.
document_data.History: The first ''Rose Scythe'' was crafted over the course of one year by a [[deva]] [[invoker]] who claimed to have been inspired by one of the rare battles waged by Chauntea in a distant past.
